workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: the workgroup the ACL is applied to.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

vlan_start.name: vlan_start
vlan_start.validation_error_text: Parameter vlan_start only accepts integer numbers.

vlan_end.name: vlan_end
vlan_end.validation_error_text: Parameter vlan_end only accepts integer numbers.

interface_id.name: interface_id
interface_id.description: Specific interface_ id add the ACL to
interface_id.validation_error_text: Parameter interface_id only accepts integer numbers.

eval_position.name: eval_position
eval_position.description: the position in the ACL list where the rule will be evaluated.
eval_position.validation_error_text: Parameter eval_position only accepts integer numbers.

entity_id.name: entity_id
entity_id.description: Specific entity_id add the ACL to
entity_id.validation_error_text: Parameter entity_id only accepts integer numbers.

allow_deny.name: allow_deny
allow_deny.description: if the ACL is an allow or deny rule.
allow_deny.validation_error_text: CGI input parameter allow_deny does not match pattern /^(allow|deny)$/

notes.name: notes
notes.description: Any notes or reason for the ACL.
notes.validation_error_text: Parameter notes only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: add_acl
description: Adds an ACL for a specific interface/workgroup combination
